Name: Mortein Bombs
Details: Over the Centuries there has been nothing better invented to contol Insects of all sorts. Protect your 'Mech Cockpits from insects for up to 3 months with the new Mortein Pest Control Bombs. This complete remedy to especially Locust, Wasp and Stinger infestations it even kills more than seven of the most insect pests and breaks the Cicada breeding cycles.This tried and trusted formula takes Bloody Insect bug control to a new level.
